definitions.text: anything that resembles a vagabond in having no fixed place
examples: pirate ships were vagabonds of the sea

definitions.text: a wanderer who has no established residence or visible means of support
move about aimlessly or without any destination, often in search of food or employment
examples: The cattle roam across the prairie
the laborers drift from one town to the next
They rolled from town to town

definitions.text: wandering aimlessly without ties to a place or community
continually changing especially as from one abode or occupation to another
